General.Name: Keystone Realtors Limited
General.Description: Keystone Realtors Limited engages in the real estate construction, development, and other related activities in India. It develops residential buildings, integrated townships, gated communities, standalone landmarks, retail spaces, business parks, and commercial projects, as well as social infrastructure projects, such as schools, clubhouses, and parks within the townships. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Mumbai, India.
General.Address: 702 Natraj, MV Road Junction, Mumbai, India, 400069
